description:
Osuzu is http://anidb.net/ch17894 [Daigorou]`s demure daughter; she is quite something to look at. Before she is forcibly procured by http://anidb.net/ch17598 [Ishimatsu], as an excuse to make up for http://anidb.net/ch17896 [Sousuke]`s insolence, she was the latter`s tutor. She is put to work with in one of http://anidb.net/ch17597 [Rikiei]`s brothels, where she meets http://anidb.net/ch4863 [Fuu] (who is also being forced into prostitution because of bad fortune) and they become friends. Both are emancipated after Rikiei`s demise.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Osuzu
